name: Exam Timetable Released
content: The final semester exam timetable is now available on the student portal.

name: Library Closure Notice
content: The library will be closed for maintenance from May 20 to May 22.

name: Prof. Anil Mehta
content: Departmental meeting scheduled for faculty members on Friday at 10:00 AM in Conference Room 2.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
content: Reminder: All students must submit their final project report by 25th May. Late submissions will not be accepted

content: Reminder: All students must submit their final project report by 25th May. Late submissions will not be accepted.

name: Prof. Anil Mehta
content: Departmental meeting scheduled for faculty members on Friday at 10:00 AM in Conference Room 2.

name: Ms. Kavita Yadav
content: Extra class for Digital Electronics will be held on Saturday from 11 AM to 1 PM. Attendance is mandatory.

content: Please complete the feedback form shared in your class group by end of day tomorrow.

content: Internship opportunity posted on the notice board. Eligible students are advised to apply by 20th May.

content: Lab exams for Semester 4 will begin from next week. Kindly check the schedule shared in your group.

name: Dr. Nidhi Sharma
content: Annual seminar on Entrepreneurship will be conducted on 22nd May. Registration is open now.

name: Prof. Rakesh Bhatnagar
content: Workshop on AutoCAD basics this Thursday in Lab 5. Only 30 slots available on first-come basis.

content: Surveying practical sessions are rescheduled to Wednesday and Friday. Check updated time slots.

content: A new lecture on Machine Learning basics will be uploaded on the LMS by this weekend.

content: Assignment 2 for Business Communication has been uploaded. Submit before 18th May midnight.

name: Dr. Ajay Pratap
content: Students attending the pharma conference must collect their ID badges by Wednesday from Admin office.
